description: how strictly to follow the standards (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX)

values.name: very

values.name: strict

values.name: explode
values.description: abort decoding on minor error detection

values.name: careful
values.description: consider things that violate the spec, are fast to check and have not been seen in the wild as errors

values.name: compliant
values.description: consider all spec non compliancies as errors

values.name: aggressive
values.description: consider things that a sane encoder should not do as an error
